title: Select service capabilities
subtitle1: This step is divided into service capabilities and specific capabilities.
subtitle2: You will need to tell suppliers which service capabilities you need, and set a weighting to show which are most important to your project. You can also set a weighting for specific capabilities.
subtitle3: You do not need to enter a weighting for any service capability or specific capability that you do not need.
subtitle4: The weighting for service capabilities must total 100% to continue to the next step.

backJump.title: Return to write and publish your requirements
